title: When is the algebra of multisymmetric polynomials generated by the elementary multisymmetric polynomials
abstract: Multisymmetric polynomials are the r-fold diagonal invariants of the symmetric group Sn. Elementary multisymmetric polynomials are analogues of the elementary symmetric polynomials, in the multisymmetric setting. In this paper, we give a necessary and sufficient condition on a ring A for the algebra of multisymmetric polynomials with coefficients in A to be generated by the elementary multisymmetric polynomials.
